text: NguYe Odale nina ngesiqu somntu omnye, Waza Wadala umfazi wakhe emkhupha kwakuye khon’ukuze onwabele uvuyo lokuhlala naye. Wathi esakwabelana naye ngesondo, wamitha wathwala umthwalo (lowo) ngokulula, kodwa wathi usakuya ubanzima (umthwalo) bathandaza kuAllâh iNkosi yabo bobabini (bathi): “Ukuba Ungasipha umntwana onyulu, siya kuba ngabanye babo banombulelo (kuWe).”
